tasks.dev: echo '[ADMIN] Starting admin app in dev mode...' && sleep 0.5 && echo '[ADMIN] Admin app running on port 4001'
tasks.test: echo '[ADMIN] Running admin tests...' && sleep 0.3 && echo '[ADMIN] All admin tests passed'
tasks.build: echo '[ADMIN] Building admin app...' && sleep 0.6 && echo '[ADMIN] Admin app build complete'
